Article Title: Smriti Mandhana wedding postponed: Has Palash Muchhal also deleted Instagram posts?
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana & Palash Muchhal Add Evil Eye Emoji To Bios Amid Cheating Rumours!

Indian women’s cricket team vice-captain Smriti Mandhana and music composer Palash Muchhal ’s wedding, which was scheduled for November 23, was postponed after unexpected health emergencies in the family.The sequence began when Mandhana’s father, Shriniwas, fell ill on the wedding day and had to be taken to a hospital. A day later, groom-to-be Palash Muchhal was also admitted to a hospital in Sangli, which is Mandhana’s hometown. He was then moved to Mumbai for further treatment and rest.Mandhana’s manager confirmed the postponement and said the families decided to delay the wedding because of these health-related developments. After the announcement, Mandhana removed all wedding-linked posts from her official Instagram account. However, some other photographs with Palash are still available on his social media pages.Both Shriniwas and Palash have now been discharged from the hospital and are recovering. However, the families have not announced a revised date for the ceremony.There has been interest in whether Palash also deleted his wedding content.As of Monday, he has not removed the video of him proposing to Smriti Mandhana. The proposal took place at the DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai, which is the same venue where the Indian women’s team won the Women’s World Cup 2025. Palash uploaded this proposal video on Instagram on November 21.Meanwhile, Team India batter Jemimah Rodrigues, who is a close friend of Mandhana, has withdrawn from the remaining matches of the Women’s Big Bash League (WBBL) to stay with her during this period. The postponement has come only weeks after India’s win in the ICC Women’s ODI World Cup, where Mandhana played a major role in the team’s campaign.
Article Summary: Smriti mandhana and palash muchhal’s wedding was scheduled for november 23. The ceremony was postponed after unexpected health emergencies in the family. Both shriniwas and palash muchhal have now been discharged from the hospital.

Article Title: 'What a welcome!': Virat Kohli showered with red flowers by young fans in Raipur – Watch
Article Text: Virat Kohli reached Raipur for the second ODI against South Africa. He scored 135 runs in the first match. Young fans greeted him warmly at the hotel. India won the first ODI by 17 runs. Kohli's century and bowlers' performance were key. Their future World Cup selection may depend on playing the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
Article Summary: Virat kohli reached raipur for the second odi against south africa. Young fans greeted him warmly at the hotel. India won the first odi by 17 runs. Their future world cup selection may depend on playing the vijay hazare trophy.

Article Title: NBA trade rumors: Golden State Warriors could eye $27 million Dallas Mavericks superstar to support Stephen Curry, Buddy Hield key trade asset?
Article Text:
Stephen Curry of the Golden State Warriors (Image via Getty)

Why the Dallas Mavericks Would Entertain It

What Each Team Gains

Golden State Warriors: What They Get Out of Marshall

Dallas Mavericks: What They Get Out of Hield

Buddy Hield (Image via Getty)

The Downsides and Risks

For the Golden State Warriors

For the Dallas Mavericks

My Final Thoughts: A Trade That Makes Sense for Both

Theand Dallas Mavericks are circling what might be one of the cleaner, more logical trade ideas of the early season: a near-salary-match swap of Buddy Hield for Naji Marshall. With both teams wrestling with roster imbalances and apron complications, this framework has gained traction among analysts - and it may only take a light third-team assist to get across the finish line.This article breaks down why the move makes sense, how the trade fits financially, and what each side stands to gain.Golden State Warriors’ backcourt has become overcrowded. The offseason addition of Seth Curry, the upcoming return of De’Anthony Melton, and the emergence of younger rotation guards have pushed Buddy Hield into a diminished role. His shooting remains valuable, but his defensive liabilities and age (32) are out of sync with what Steve Kerr needs around Stephen Curry as he enters his age-37 season.The Warriors are hunting for wing depth, size, and defensive presence - something Naji Marshall brings immediately. Marshall, at 6’7”, plays with an edge that fits their small-ball identity. As Sporting News framed it, this is a chance to flip “regression for progression.”Dallas Mavericks have struggled early due to injuries and uneven spacing around Luka Dončić and Kyrie Irving. Adding Hield’s proven 40 percent career three-point shooting, currently at 35 percent, gives the Mavericks a plug-and-play floor-spacer who thrives off the ball.A reunion between Hield and Luka makes sense: catch-and-shoot gravity is the one thing that Dallas always seems to need more of. While Hield’s defense remains a concern, Dallas isn’t chasing him to guard wings, they want him to stretch the floor and revive an offense that has sputtered at times.The finances are straightforward, which is rare in today’s apron-heavy NBA. Both players make around $9 million, creating a clean match.The only obstacle is the apron. Both teams are close enough to the line that a harmless third-team salary dump could be required—but nothing involving picks or additional rotation players.This is why analysts consider the deal both realistic and low-friction.Early 2025-26 numbers paint a clear contrast between the two players’ current trajectories.• A 6’7” defensive-minded wing who fits switch-heavy schemes• Added toughness in a frontcourt that still relies heavily on Draymond Green• A more balanced roster without inflating payroll• Perimeter defense that helps mask aging legs in the core rotation• A player averaging 1.3 steals per game - something the Warriors badly need• A career 40 percent shooter who improves spacing instantly• A complementary weapon for Luka Dončić when defenses overload• A veteran scorer who can help stabilize inconsistent bench units• A temporary boost while waiting for injured wings to return• A no-risk flier on a player looking for a fresh startNo trade is perfect, and both franchises would accept certain risks.• Marshall’s 25.8 percent from deep is a real concern• Spacing around Curry and Klay Thompson could tighten• Marshall doesn’t solve their backup-center issues• Hield’s defense remains a glaring weakness• At 32, he offers less long-term upside• He could struggle to earn closing minutes in high-stakes gamesYet neither set of risks is deal-breaking - especially in December, when teams still have time to adjust.This rumored swap is not a blockbuster. It won’t dominate headlines like a superstar trade. But the best in-season moves are often the simplest, targeting needs instead of names.Also read: NBA trade rumors: Los Angeles Lakers predicted to chase $186 million Milwaukee Bucks star to form the league’s next superteam The Warriors would be trading fading shooting for live-wire defense. The Mavericks would be trading defensive grit for floor spacing. Both would be addressing immediate problems without sacrificing assets or flexibility. And in an NBA where margins matter, this is exactly the kind of understated deal that can quietly shift a season. If the teams can navigate the apron complications with a small third-team assist, this is a trade that checks every box.
Article Summary: Golden state warriors’ backcourt has become overcrowded. Naji marshall, at 6’7”, plays with an edge that fits their small-ball identity. Dallas mavericks have struggled early due to injuries and uneven spacing around luka dončić and kyrie irving.

Article Title: Madison Beer turns Chargers’ victory into a birthday celebration for her mom as Justin Herbert powers through injury
Article Text:
Madison Beer and Justin Herbert (via Getty Images)

Justin Herbert’s gritty performance heightens momentum and fuels talk around his relationship with Madison Beer

Madison Beer brought more than star power to Sunday’s Chargers–Raiders matchup; she also got a full family celebration. While Los Angeles cruised to a 31–14 win, Beer transformed one of SoFi Stadium’s suites into an intimate birthday event for her mother, Tracie Beer. The game itself delivered plenty of excitement, but the off-field moment stole hearts online.Fans watched Madison lead a surprise complete with cupcakes, candles, and a warm sing-along of ‘Happy Birthday.’ Tracie later shared the clips on Instagram, including the touching moment Madison wrapped her mom in a tight hug. The family presence added new buzz around Beer’s growing connection with Chargers quarterback Justin Herbert Even as the suite celebrations unfolded, Justin Herbert was commanding attention with a performance defined by both efficiency and grit. The star quarterback suffered a broken left hand early in the game, fortunately, his non-throwing hand, and yet he remained on the field, completing 15 of 20 passes for 151 yards and two touchdowns.His perseverance pushed the Chargers to their eighth win, keeping them firmly in the AFC playoff race at 8–4.On Monday, Herbert underwent surgery, but both he and the team sounded confident about his availability moving forward. Offering a promising update, Herbert told reporters, "I think they are pretty hopeful actually… It's one of those things where you stabilize it.They are hopeful, so that's a good thing." With a primetime matchup against the Eagles on December 8 approaching, his potential return continues to be a major storyline. Off the field, Herbert’s bond with Madison Beer again became a focal point for fans. With Madison’s mother now attending games, many see it as a sign that the relationship is strengthening.The timing couldn’t be more compelling as the Chargers chase a postseason berth and prepare for a potentially decisive Week 18 showdown with the Broncos, a game that may carry major playoff weight. And if Beer is in the building again, Herbert will certainly hope the good luck continues, minus the injuries.Also read: “End of an old chapter”: Justin Herbert’s beau Madison Beer gets emotional unveiling her new era with her new album ‘Locket’
Article Summary: Madison beer celebrated her mother's birthday in a suite during sunday's chargers-raiders game. Her mother, tracie beer, attended the game and watched as her daughter surprised her with cupcakes, candles, and a sing-along of ‘happy birthday’ justin herbert, who suffered a broken hand in the game, completed 15 of 20 passes for 151 yards and two touchdowns.

Article Title: NHL Update: Cal Foote signs pro deal amid ongoing Hockey Canada sexual assault controversy
Article Text:
Cal Foote leaves the London Courthouse, in London, Ontario, Canada after being acquitted of sexual assault charges, on July 24, 2025. (Credit: Getty Images)

Cal Foote returns as Hockey Canada sexual assault case resurfaces



Cal Foote’s return to professional hockey. He has once again placed the Hockey Canada sexual assault controversy in the spotlight. On Monday, the American Hockey League’s Chicago Wolves officially announced that Foote had signed a professional deal, signaling a potential pathway back toward the NHL after a lengthy absence from competitive play.The news arrives during a period of heightened sensitivity around league conduct, accountability, and public perception. While no on-ice action has yet followed the signing, Foote’s return alone has been enough to generate significant NHL updates and discussion, particularly as organizations continue navigating how to respond to players connected to unresolved off-ice controversies.Foote, who previously appeared in 145 NHL games. He had not played professionally since the Hockey Canada sexual assault investigation became public. The case is tied to the 2018 World Junior Championship team. He has remained a major issue within the sport. Also, influencing roster decisions, contract talks, and league-wide discourse. Although legal proceedings are ongoing. The reputational impact of the scandal continues to shape public reaction whenever a related player re-enters the hockey scene.The decision by the Chicago Wolves, an AHL organization with strong NHL affiliations.It has drawn mixed responses. Some view the move as a standard hockey operation centered on depth and experience. While others believe it reflects a broader issue within professional hockey about timing and transparency. The Wolves have not indicated whether Foote will immediately join the lineup. Thus, leaving questions about his role and readiness unanswered.From a purely hockey perspective, Foote brings size and defensive awareness. Prior NHL experience was developed during stints with multiple franchises.As Foote resumes his professional career, attention will remain fixed not just on his performance but also on how teams, leagues, and governing bodies address lingering concerns tied to the Hockey Canada case.Also Read: NHL Update: Brad Marchand and his family hosts Thanksgiving to comfort teammates missing home
Article Summary: Cal foote had not played professionally since the hockey canada sexual assault investigation became public. The case is tied to the 2018 world junior championship team. The reputational impact of the scandal continues to shape public reaction whenever a related player re-enters the hockey scene.

Article Title: Auston Matthews’ captaincy questioned as former Leafs GM hints the team elevated the wrong figure
Article Text:
Former Leafs GM slams current leadership and claims Auston Matthews was the wrong choice for captain (Getty Images)

Former Leafs boss criticizes leadership group and suggests Matthews isn’t the captain Toronto desperately needs





The Toronto Maple Leafs find themselves in a moment of uncomfortable reflection. What began as a bold shift in leadership by handing Auston Matthews the captaincy has now become a topic of pointed criticism, sparked by a former executive who feels the team lost its compass. The question drawing attention across the hockey world is simple. Did the Leafs pick the wrong captain, and are they now paying the price through uninspired play and fragile identity?Former Leafs GM Gord Stellick spoke plainly about the heart of the issue. He believes leadership and talent are not synonymous. He said, "There's nothing wrong if your best player isn't a leader. All I can say is last year, you couldn't be more of a team guy, a classy guy, the way he (John Tavares) handled the transition, and then the leadership meant nothing, it's not even a visible thing. It's almost like an award to wear the C. " His words echo the sentiment of many frustrated fans who now look back at that decision with uneasy hindsight.Stellick did not stop at questioning Auston Matthews as captain. He revealed who he would have chosen. "If you would have asked me a few years ago, I would've picked Morgan Rielly. He kind of strikes me as a captain, but its an important thing being the captain, and the leadership group is important."Rielly has longevity and presence, but like Matthews, has never quite taken command of the locker room in that commanding way a captain must.Tavares remains the quiet constant. A professional who knows when to speak, when to deliver and when to let his play do the talking. Yet the captaincy shift forced him to take a step back in title, even if not in spirit. Stellick suggested the leadership change carried symbolism more than substance, raising the concern that the Leafs valued optics over intrinsic leadership dynamics.Still, accountability now rests on the current leaders. As Stellick put it, "At some point you got to evolve to be the real leaders, and that's where we're going to find out now, a litmus test, about a team that has no business [being] where they are right now, and can this leadership group lead them?" That test is already underway.If Matthews and his leadership group cannot steer this franchise back to identity and resilience, then the Maple Leafs may soon find John Tavares acting as the quiet stabilizing force once more. Captain or not, his presence still commands respect, even without the C sewn onto his jersey.Also Read: Connor Bedard’s fearless statement after Ducks game shows he’s ready to change the NHL narrative
Article Summary: Former leafs gm slams current leadership and claims auston matthews was the wrong choice for captain. Gord stellick suggested the leadership change carried symbolism more than substance, raising the concern that the leafs valued optics over intrinsic leadership dynamics.

Article Title: NHL Alexey Toropchenko and Jimmy Snuggerud Injury Updates: St. Louis Blues suffer major impact after injuries
Article Text:
NHL Alexey Toropchenko and Jimmy Snuggerud Injury Updates: St. Louis Blues suffer major impact after injuries (Credit: Getty Images)

Toropchenko and Snuggerud's injury impact on St. Louis Blues



The St. Louis Blues released concerning NHL injury updates on Monday, confirming that two regular forwards will be unavailable for an extended period. The timing could not be worse, with the team trying to stabilize its lineup amid mixed NHL match results over recent weeks.Injuries are part of the league’s reality, but losing two players under very different circumstances has amplified concern. One setback came during regular-season play, while the other happened entirely away from the ice, underscoring how unpredictable roster challenges can be in the NHL.Forward Alexey Toropchenko is expected to miss multiple weeks after suffering scalding burns to his legs in a home accident. The incident was confirmed as non-hockey related, and the team has provided limited details, listing him as week-to-week. Toropchenko’s physical presence and defensive responsibility had made him a reliable bottom-six option, and his absence thins the Blues’ forward depth during upcoming NHL match previews.Before the injury, Toropchenko had been regularly involved in tough minutes, including penalty-kill situations and matchups against opposing checking lines.At the same time, rookie forward Jimmy Snuggerud will be sidelined for at least six weeks after undergoing surgery on his left wrist. The young forward had reportedly been playing through discomfort before medical staff determined surgery was necessary.Snuggerud’s injury is a blow to the offensive side of the lineup. The rookie had shown steady development and contributed timely scoring. Thus, making his absence noticeable in the top-nine rotation. Losing both a developing scorer and a physical depth forward. That too, simultaneously complicates lineup balance.For now, the focus remains on recovery. If Toropchenko and Snuggerud return as expected later in the season, they could provide a timely boost. Until then, the Blues must navigate a demanding schedule. That too, without two key pieces of their forward group.Also Read: NHL Update: Brad Marchand and his family hosts Thanksgiving to comfort teammates missing home
Article Summary: Nhl alexey toropchenko and jimmy snuggerud injury updates: st. louis blues suffer major impact after injuries.toropchenko is expected to miss multiple weeks after suffering scalding burns to his legs in a home accident. At the same time, rookie forward jimmy snuggerud will be sidelined for at least six weeks after undergoing surgery on his left wrist.

Article Title: Shedeur Sanders’ mom shows off proud mama style in unforgettable glam game-day look
Article Text:
Shedeur Sanders’ mom Pilar (Instagram)

Shedeur Sanders’ performance and mom Pilar’s unwavering support





Shedeur Sanders stepped onto the field for his first professional home start with the Cleveland Browns on Sunday against the San Francisco 49ers, and all eyes were on both him and his supportive mom, Pilar Sanders. The rookie quarterback, drafted in the fifth round despite high expectations, has already started making waves after a victory over the Las Vegas Raiders last week. Throwing for 209 yards, a touchdown, and one interception, Shedeur proved that he could rise to the occasion when given the opportunity.This week, after being named QB1 over Dillon Gabriel, Sanders balanced preparation with family support. He spent time at his mother’s home with brother Shilo, enjoying home-cooked meals and studying film before the big game. But pregame attention wasn’t reserved for his on-field performance alone. Shedeur made headlines with a self-promoting outfit from his Legendary brand, and Pilar followed suit with a bold statement fit of her own. Browns fans and media couldn’t help but notice, as she continues to turn heads with her stylish game-day ensembles.Despite the cold, mom Pilar was at the stadium to cheer her star son on in person. She previously stole the spotlight during Shedeur Sanders’ NFL debut with a custom t-shirt, and Sunday’s winter-ready look was just as memorable.On the field, Shedeur completed 16-of-25 passes for 149 yards, adding a touchdown and a seven-yard rush. While the Browns fell short against the 49ers, the young quarterback’s potential remains clear.“Very committed to working at it, doing a great job, communicating with coaches, with the players,” Browns coach Kevin Stefanski said of Sanders. “Good work week, but nothing different. I think any player, though, once you get one game under your belt, you got the next one coming. I think it can only help.”Shedeur Sanders is not only focused on proving himself on the field but is also buoyed by the confidence and style of his mom. Whether he maintains the starting role for the rest of the season remains to be seen, but one thing is certain: Pilar Sanders will be there, front and center, cheering him on every step of the way.Also Read: While Drake Maye preps quietly for Giants, wife Ann’s viral gym photo brings unexpected buzz to Patriots fans
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders made his nfl debut for the cleveland browns on sunday. His mom, pilar sanders, was at the game to cheer him on. Shedeur completed 16-of-25 passes for 149 yards, adding a touchdown and a seven-yard rush.

Article Title: While Drake Maye preps quietly for Giants, wife Ann’s viral gym photo brings unexpected buzz to Patriots fans
Article Text:
Drake Maye’s wife Ann (Instagram)

Ann Maye’s fitness-ready selfie (Instagram)

Ann Michael Maye becomes a social media sensation among Patriots fans





Drake Maye is quickly cementing himself as one of the NFL’s brightest young quarterbacks. The second-year North Carolina Tar Heels alum has energized the New England Patriots, who are sitting atop the league with a 10-2 record. Maye has thrown for 3,130 yards, 21 touchdowns, and just six interceptions, a performance reminiscent of the Brady-Belichick era in New England. Fans are buzzing about his growth, consistency, and ability to make plays under pressure, signaling that the Patriots are serious Super Bowl contenders this season.While Drake shines on the field, his wife, Ann Michael Maye, has become a star in her own right. She recently shared a “Good morning, Sunday” post featuring her pilates outfit, drawing attention from Patriots fans and social media enthusiasts alike. Ann Michael teaches pilates and shares glimpses of her life, cooking, and baking on TikTok, which has earned her nearly 100,000 followers and 1.4 million likes. Patriots fans flood her comments, celebrating Drake’s on-field success while admiring the meals and lifestyle she showcases.Ann Michael’s rise on TikTok has been remarkable. Her videos offer a mix of fitness, cooking, and personal life content that resonates with both sports fans and lifestyle followers.House of Highlights even featured her account, highlighting how Patriots fans engage with her content, showing love for Drake while appreciating Ann’s culinary skills. Beyond her social media presence, she’s a constant support system for star Drake, attending games in stylish outfits that reflect her vibrant personality.Drake Maye and Ann’s journey is intertwined with football. Both attended the University of North Carolina, and Ann’s brother Tad also played quarterback with Maye. The couple married on June 21 in North Carolina, blending personal milestones with Drake’s professional rise. Drake’s rookie season hinted at his potential with 2,276 yards, 15 touchdowns, and a Pro Bowl selection, but this season, with added talent and coaching under Mike Vrabel, he is thriving.As the New England Patriots prepare to face the New York Giants on Monday Night Football, Drake Maye’s on-field brilliance and Ann Michael’s growing social media presence make them one of the NFL’s most compelling power couples. With their blend of talent, charisma, and fan engagement, they are capturing attention both on and off the field.Also Read: Justin Herbert injury update: Will Chargers star QB mis games as he needs 'medical procedure' after hand fracture
Article Summary: Ann michael maye is the wife of new england patriots quarterback drake maye. The couple married on june 21 in north carolina, blending personal milestones with drake’s professional rise. Ann michael shares glimpses of her life, cooking, and baking on tiktok. She has nearly 100,000 followers and 1.4 million likes.

Article Title: Patriots TE Hunter Henry’s wife Parker found solace in working as a registered nurse even after her husband made millions in the NFL
Article Text:
(Image via Instagram: Hunter Henry with wife Parker and kids)

Hunter Henry signed a $6 million contract when his wife Parker Elizabeth Schmidly worked as a labor and delivery nurse

Hunter Henry’s wife Parker says being an NFL wife isn’t all “glitz and glamour”



Also Read:

Parker Elizabeth Schmidly opened up to Kelly Burch of Business Insider, revealing how she balanced her demanding nursing career while her husband, Hunter Henry, sustained in the NFL spotlight. Her journey traces back to the moment she first met the New England Patriots tight end.Parker first crossed paths with Henry at the University of Arkansas, where he was a year ahead of her. As she neared the end of her nursing degree, Henry was drafted by the San Diego Chargers (now, Los Angeles Chargers) in 2016, laying the groundwork for a long-distance romance.Despite the miles between them, their bond grew stronger, leading to their marriage in 2018, the same year Parker proudly graduated as a nurse. For the next two and a half years, she found deep purpose and fulfillment working as a registered labor and delivery nurse.Henry’s career has been marked by steady value growth. He began in June 2016 with a four-year, $6.38 million deal, including nearly $4 million guaranteed and a hefty signing bonus of $2.38 million.By March 2020, he secured a lucrative one-year franchise tag with the Chargers, worth over $10 million.The following year, he landed a three-year, $37.5 million contract with the Patriots, and in March 2024, his performance earned him a $27 million extension in New England.When Hunter joined New England in 2021, Parker hesitated at the thought of leaving for Boston. But as soon as she set foot in Massachusetts, she was struck by how much the spirit of Arkansas resonated, where she and Henry had spent their childhood. The weather felt familiar, and the people proved just as steadfast.When the NFL WAG moved to Massachusetts and discovered she was expecting her son, she hung up her nurse’s scrubs. Her sense of purpose flourished from caring for patients to nurturing her growing family, now soon to include three children. Every now and then, she teases that she might just become a school nurse to keep up with her kids.Parker never misses a home game with her kids, but away games turn into a puzzle. “We can’t travel or even stay with the team, so I need to figure out our flights and accommodations,” she told Burch. No matter how late the night, the team always flies straight home, which means Hunter often walks through the door before Parker and the kids do.Parker hits the road for away games whenever Hunter plays in a city where family or friends await. Otherwise, she and her son turn every away match into a cozy ritual at home. Since he naps from 1 to 3 PM each day, they strike a deal: if the game starts early, he gets to catch the second half after his nap.Parker laughs at the fascination with NFL wives and girlfriends, seeing herself and others as regular people simply “trying to wake up and get through the week.” The “glitz and glam” of being an NFL WAG quickly fades away when “you’re handling the mental load of running a home, getting the kids to school, and packing lunches.”During football season, the tight end is entirely in the dark about the daily happenings at home. With no family nearby, Parker depends on hired help to keep things running smoothly in the house. She even uses a Skylight Calendar, allowing the tight end to catch a glimpse of his son at preschool on special occasions.Now that Parker’s son is older, he eagerly tracks Hunter’s schedule, wanting to know where Daddy is traveling, when he’ll return, and the timing of every game. The calendar helps him bridge the distance and feel his father’s presence even when the tight end is away.
Article Summary: Hunter henry signed a $6 million contract when his wife parker elizabeth schmidly worked as a labor and delivery nurse. The nfl wag says being an nfl wife isn’t all “glitz and glamour’ the tight end is entirely in the dark about the daily happenings at home.

Article Title: NHL trade rumors: Elliotte Friedman reports rising interest in Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen as Sabres weigh major goalie move
Article Text:
Trade buzz grows as Sabres weigh next move with Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen (Image via: Getty Images)

Why Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen is Sabres’ most talked-about trade option



Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen Hits Head Off Post After Collision with Jonatan Berggren

The Buffalo Sabres are facing a growing problem in their goaltending situation, and it has pushed Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen into the middle of trade speculation. What began as an attempt to manage three goalies has turned into one of the biggest issues around the team, with long gaps between starts and shaky performances becoming harder to ignore.As the situation drags on, NHL insiders are paying close attention. Elliotte Friedman has pointed to Luukkonen as the main name to watch, especially with the young goalie wanting more consistent playing time. With the Sabres struggling to find a steady rotation, the question is now how long they can wait before making a decision.Since returning to the lineup, Luukkonen has been part of a three-goalie setup with Alex Lyon and Colten Ellis. Instead of helping the team, this plan has led to long breaks between starts for each goalie. Lyon’s recent five-goal outing against the New Jersey Devils after nearly two weeks without playing showed how difficult it is for any goalie to stay sharp under this system.That inconsistency has fueled the trade buzz. On The FAN Hockey Show, Elliotte Friedman said Luukkonen is the goalie attracting the most interest, noting that he wants more chances and has shown enough upside for teams to take notice.While he had a rough game against the Pittsburgh Penguins, he quickly bounced back by stopping 23 of 24 shots against the Winnipeg Jets.Despite injury concerns and uneven stretches, Luukkonen still carries the strongest trade value. Ellis has looked good but is still inexperienced, while Lyon fits better as a reliable backup rather than a full-time starter. Trading Luukkonen would also help open the door for top prospect Devon Levi to take a real step toward earning NHL minutes next season.Pierre LeBrun recently reported that the Sabres are not pushing hard to move him right now. Even so, with interest rising around the league and the rotation failing to settle, the pressure on Buffalo’s front office continues to build. A decision on Luukkonen’s future may be unavoidable as the team looks for stability and a clearer long-term plan in net.Also Read: NHL Update: 2018 Canadian World Junior players back in the game after sexual assault trial acquittal
Article Summary: Ukko-pekka luukkonen has been part of a three-goalie setup with alex lyon and colten ellis. Ellis has looked good but is still inexperienced, while lyon fits better as a reliable backup rather than a full-time starter. The sabres are not pushing hard to move him right now.

Article Title: Gianni Infantino net worth: How rich is the FIFA president whom Donald Trump praised as an “excellent guy”?
Article Text:
Gianni Infantino net worth revealed.Image via: Getty

Gianni Infantino’s net worth and the major football projects he has championed

Also read:

FIFA president Gianni Infantino has landed back in the news, not because of a tournament announcement, but because of a very public shoutout from Donald Trump in Riyadh. During Trump’s busy visit to Saudi Arabia, he introduced Infantino to Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman inside the Royal Court and was seen on camera calling him “an excellent guy,” even joking about how good he looked.Infantino, a Swiss-Italian lawyer who rose from working at UEFA to becoming FIFA president in 2016, has only strengthened his position since, winning re-elections in 2019 and 2023. His time in charge has brought major changes: expanded tournaments, World Cups hosted in Russia and Qatar and full support for Saudi Arabia’s successful bid for the 2034 World Cup.As of 2025, Infantino’s net worth is estimated at around 14 million dollars, a figure built from his long career within football’s governing bodies. His compensation package as FIFA president includes a multimillion-dollar salary and bonuses, placing him among the highest-earning executives in global sports. His previous roles at UEFA and years spent navigating the administrative side of football have also contributed to his overall wealth. While he does not come close to the billion-dollar empires seen in ownership circles, Infantino sits firmly in the elite tier of sports executives.Under his watch, FIFA has approved several major moves. The men’s World Cup will expand to 48 teams starting in 2026, making it the largest version in history. He oversaw the awarding of the 2030 World Cup to Spain, Portugal and Morocco, and supported Saudi Arabia’s successful bid for 2034. He has also backed new global competitions, broader development projects and long-term plans aimed at pushing football into new geographic and commercial territory.Heading through 2025, Infantino continues to operate in a space where sport, finance and international visibility overlap. His decisions carry enormous weight, and he remains one of the key figures shaping what the next era of world football will look like.Looking ahead, Infantino is pushing a new wave of projects designed to expand football even more. He is currently overseeing the build-up to the 48-team 2026 World Cup in the United States, Canada and Mexico, which is set to be the biggest tournament FIFA has ever held. He is also supporting new international club events, stronger youth development programs and long-term investment plans focused on countries where the sport is still growing.
Article Summary: Fifa president gianni infantino's net worth is estimated at around 14 million dollars. His compensation package as fifa president includes a multimillion-dollar salary and bonuses. He is currently overseeing the build-up to the 48-team 2026 world cup in the united states, canada and mexico.

Article Title: Chloe Kim reveals “best kind of busy” life update amid 2026 Olympic prep with boyfriend Myles Garrett featured in the cutest way
Article Text:
Inside Chloe Kim’s “best kind of busy” routine (Image via: Twitter)

Chloe Kim balancing Olympic schedule and her relationship with Myles Garrett



Chloe Kim is stepping into one of the most demanding phases of her career, and her latest Instagram update reflects just how full her days have become. The Olympic snowboarder offered a small look at her packed routine as she balances a heavy training load for the 2026 Winter Olympics with meaningful personal moments. Her caption, “Been busy in the best way!”, summed up how she’s embracing the pace with calm focus and a clear mindset.The 25-year-old also included a personal highlight in the carousel, a warm moment featuring her boyfriend, Cleveland Browns star Myles Garrett. The brief inclusion was subtle yet noticeable, adding a small window into the support system behind her growing momentum toward the next Olympic stage.Kim’s update offered a glimpse into her current training rhythm, showing how structured and intentional her preparation has become as the 2026 Winter Olympics draw closer. The short clips captured the controlled movements, repeated drills, and focused energy that define this stage of her buildup—an early sign that she is shifting into a more intensive phase of readiness, both physically and mentally.Alongside these training glimpses, the carousel also included a brief appearance from Myles Garrett, adding a warm, understated moment to an otherwise work-heavy update. The inclusion didn’t overpower the post but instead hinted at how she weaves small, personal pockets of normalcy into her demanding schedule.It subtly highlighted her balance, pursuing another Olympic run while still preserving space for the relationship that supports her behind the scenes.Rather than showcasing a full range of lifestyle images, Kim kept the post simple, sharing only a relaxed snapshot that contrasted her training footage. The calm, everyday feel of the picture reinforced the idea that her life isn’t consumed solely by preparation even with a major Olympic year approaching, she continues to create room for grounding moments away from the slopes.Kim’s journey remains one of the most remarkable in winter sports, from winning her first Olympic gold as a teenager to reclaiming the top spot in 2022. Her latest update suggests she is entering another driven, purposeful stretch as she aims for a third Olympic title in 2026.Also Read: Ex-NFL star’s estranged wife Lindsay Shiver asks court to remove ankle tag, citing modeling career and family needs ahead of murder trial
Article Summary: Olympic snowboarder chloe kim shared a video of her training routine on instagram. The 25-year-old is preparing for the 2026 winter olympics in south korea. Kim also included a personal highlight featuring her boyfriend, myles garrett.

Article Title: Did Taylor Swift just hijack the NFL Week? New chart record drops hours before Chiefs vs Texans
Article Text:
Taylor Swift lands a new No. 1 milestone hours before the Kansas City Chiefs face the Houston Texans. (Images via Instagram)

Taylor Swift extends her chart dominance right before the Kansas City Chiefs host the Houston Texans

Taylor Swift and the Kansas City Chiefs narrative grows as Billboard updates its Hot 100 numbers

Taylor Swift attendance at the Kansas City Chiefs and Houston Texans game becomes the weekend’s biggest NFL question

Taylor Swift entered the Kansas City Chiefs week with a surge of momentum that has nothing to do with football. The Chiefs and Houston Texans game is getting swallowed by the pop star’s latest career milestone after Billboard confirmed her newest hit is now tied for the longest No. 1 run of her career. The timing could not be louder. Kansas City plays at home, Travis Kelce is back in the spotlight, and Taylor Swift arrives at the weekend with a chart win that shifts the entire storyline again.Taylor Swift has been promoting her latest album “The Life of a Showgirl” since Oct. 3. She has spoken publicly about making it during the tour, balancing three-show runs with midweek flights to Sweden, and recording while exhausted but creatively locked in. Her effort has translated into another wave of record breaking numbers that hit just hours before the Chiefs and Texans step on the field.Taylor Swift received confirmation on Dec. 1 that “The Fate of Ophelia” has matched “Anti-Hero” as her longest-running Billboard Hot 100 No. 1. It has now spent eight total weeks at the top of the chart. The reporting from Billboard states that this run is even more significant because holiday music has flooded the top ten. Mariah Carey , Wham, Brenda Lee and Bobby Helms all climbed into the highest positions this week, which normally pushes non-holiday songs down.Taylor Swift held her spot anyway.Billboard credits “The Fate of Ophelia” with 21.6 million streams, 62.1 million radio impressions and 25,000 copies sold in the United States between Nov. 21 and Nov. 27. The track also kept its lead on Streaming Songs, returned to No. 1 on Digital Song Sales and rose to No. 2 on Radio Songs. A Chainsmokers remix released on Nov. 25 reportedly lifted her late November numbers.She told Travis Kelce and Jason Kelce, “I wanted melodies that were so infectious that you were almost angry at it and lyrics that are just as vivid, but crisp and focused and completely intentional.”She also spoke about the toll of creating while touring. “I would be playing three shows in a row, I’d have three days off. I’d fly to Sweden, go back to the tour, and I was pretty exhausted at this point in the tour, but I was so mentally simulated and so excited to be creating.”The success of “The Fate of Ophelia” now positions Taylor Swift at the front of the conversation as the Kansas City Chiefs enter the weekend. The chart news hit before kickoff, and every major outlet reporting on it has pushed her name directly into NFL storylines again.Taylor Swift already holds multiple No. 1s from the last decade. Billboard listed “Anti-Hero,” “Blank Space,” “Cruel Summer,” “Shake It Off,” “Look What You Made Me Do,” “We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together,” “Fortnight,” “Is It Over Now,” “All Too Well,” “Willow,” “Cardigan” and “Bad Blood” alongside her newest hit. The update notes that Taylor Swift now has thirteen total No. 1 singles. “The Fate of Ophelia” and “Anti-Hero” are her longest leaders, both running for eight weeks.Her latest jump comes as she continues to release content connected to her tour. A new trailer for her Disney Plus docuseries features Taylor Swift delivering an emotional message during her final Eras Tour concert in Vancouver on Dec. 8, 2024. She told the crowd, “We’ve had so long to prepare for the end of this tour, and we get to play one last show for you here tonight.”She followed it with another line that previewed the tone of the upcoming series.“I want to thank every single one of you for being a part of the most thrilling chapter of my entire life to date.”Taylor Swift has attended every Kansas City Chiefs home game this season. The singer has avoided traveling for away games, but she has continued to show up quietly at Arrowhead Stadium. Elle reported on Oct. 29 that Taylor Swift has been keeping a lower profile to avoid drawing excessive attention during Travis Kelce’s season. The magazine confirmed that she has been entering the stadium without being filmed.The Kansas City Chiefs host the Houston Texans, which places Taylor Swift back in play for an appearance. Nothing official has been confirmed, but the pattern is clear. She has attended home games. She has avoided away ones. This is a home game.The next major date on Taylor Swift’s calendar is Dec. 12 when “The End of an Era” premieres on Disney Plus. The six episode series shows behind the scenes footage from her tour, including rehearsals, life on the road and on camera moments with Travis Kelce. It also includes a brand new acoustic set.Taylor Swift also released two full albums during the Eras Tour, “The Tortured Poets Department” in April 2024 and “The Life of a Showgirl” in Oct. 2025. She also re-recorded “Speak Now (Taylor’s Version)” and “1989 (Taylor’s Version)” while traveling globally for the tour. The trailer features Sabrina Carpenter, Gracie Abrams and Ed Sheeran.Her schedule is packed with release dates and promotional cycles, but none of them conflict with the Chiefs and Texans game. Given her attendance pattern, her connection to Kansas City and the timing of her chart milestone, Taylor Swift enters Sunday as the most talked about figure surrounding the matchup.
Article Summary: “the fate of ophelia’ has matched “anti-hero” as her longest-running billboard hot 100 no. 1. It has now spent eight total weeks at the top of the chart. Mariah carey, wham, brenda lee and bobby helms all climbed into the highest positions this week. Taylor swift has attended every kansas city chiefs home game this season.

Article Title: St. Louis Blues sign Akil Thomas in NHL trade with Los Angeles Kings to strengthen forward lineup and AHL prospect depth
Article Text:
Blues add Akil Thomas from Kings in key trade (Image via: Getty Images)

Akil Thomas to bring scoring talent and professional experience to Springfield



The St. Louis Blues have made a strategic move to enhance their forward depth by acquiring 25-year-old Akil Thomas from the Los Angeles Kings. Announced by Blues President of Hockey Operations and General Manager Doug Armstrong, the trade sends forward Nikita Alexandrov to the Kings. Thomas is expected to report to the Blues’ AHL affiliate, the Springfield Thunderbirds, giving the organization a boost in offensive talent and NHL-ready prospects.This trade highlights the Blues’ commitment to building a competitive roster while strengthening their minor league system. With NHL experience and a proven scoring record in the AHL, Thomas is positioned to make an immediate impact for Springfield and potentially contribute to St. Louis at the NHL level. The move also provides the Kings with a fresh opportunity to integrate Alexandrov into their lineup, adding depth to their forward group.Thomas has been a consistent offensive presence in the AHL, recording 13 points (four goals, nine assists) in 19 games with the Ontario Reign this season. Over 176 AHL games, he has accumulated 106 points, including 50 goals and 56 assists, along with 76 penalty minutes.Beyond the AHL, Thomas has appeared in 32 NHL games with the Kings, tallying seven points (four goals, three assists) and nine penalty minutes, showcasing his readiness for higher-level competition. Drafted 51st overall in the second round of the 2018 NHL Draft, Thomas combines scoring ability with versatility, making him a valuable asset for the Blues organization.Nikita Alexandrov, meanwhile, joins the Los Angeles Kings after six seasons with the Blues organization. The 25-year-old German forward tallied 143 points (61 goals, 82 assists) in 188 AHL games and added nine points in 51 NHL contests. Alexandrov’s experience and consistency give the Kings a promising addition to their forward corps as they look to enhance depth and scoring potential.By adding Akil Thomas, the St. Louis Blues strengthen both their immediate AHL roster and long-term NHL prospects. This trade reflects the organization’s focus on balancing veteran talent with developing players who can make a difference at every level, ensuring competitiveness and depth for years to come.Also Read: NHL match today: Will Cale Makar play against Vancouver Canucks tonight? Latest update on Colorado Avalanche defenceman for December 2
Article Summary: Blues add akil thomas from kings in key trade. Thomas to bring scoring talent and professional experience to springfield thunderbirds. Nikita alexandrov joins the los angeles kings after six seasons with the blues. This trade reflects the organization’s focus on balancing veteran talent with developing players who can make a difference at every level.

Article Title: Danilo Gallinari retirement news: Italian player announces emotional good bye after remarkable 20-year basketball journey
Article Text:
Danilo Gallinari is retiring (Image via NBA)

Veteran forward Danilo Gallinari ends remarkable journey with emotional retirement note

Danilo Gallinari ends a long journey after playing for many NBA teams

Former NBA great and long-time member of the Italian national team, Danilo Gallinari, has retired from basketball at the age of 37, according to Shams Charania of ESPN. Gallinari played for a number of clubs over his 16-year NBA career, starting with the New York Knicks, who took him sixth overall in the 2008 draft. He missed two seasons due to ruptured ACLs.His most recent team was the Puerto Rican Vaqueros de Bayamon, where he not only secured the first title of his professional career but also received the Finals MVP accolade. He was recognized primarily for his stint with the Knicks, where he was the youthful-looking player involved with their rebuilding effort just before the 2010 free agency class.A long-time National Basketball Association forward, Danilo Gallinari, recently announced his retirement from playing basketball. Announcing the same, Shams Charania wrote on X:“Danilo Gallinari has retired from basketball after 20 professional seasons, including 16 in the NBA. The No. 6 pick in the 2008 draft out of Italy played 777 career NBA regular season games…”Over the course of his 16-year NBA career, the No. 6 choice in the 2008 draft participated in 777 regular-season games. His most notable six-year tenure was with the Denver Nuggets, when he averaged 19.5 points and 5.3 rebounds per game in 2015-16.Meanwhile, Gallinari himself announced the news on X and wrote:“Today, with a heart full of gratitude, I am announcing my retirement from a career I’ve always dreamed of. A career built through hard work, sacrifice, victories, defeats, teammates who became brothers, guidance from my coaches, and, of course, family and friends that were with me every step of the way…”He further stated:“It’s been an incredible journey filled with countless memories that I will carry with me for the rest of my life. To those who believed in me, to all those who supported me, and to those who shared every moment with me – thank you, from the bottom of my heart. I’m beyond excited for the next chapter!”Gallinari was also on the rosters of the New York Knicks, Los Angeles Clippers, Oklahoma City Thunder, and Atlanta Hawks during his NBA career.With Vaqueros de Bayamon, he won the domestic league championship for the first time during his final season in Puerto Rico.He then played for the Denver Nuggets, Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Washington Wizards, Detroit Pistons, and Milwaukee Bucks. According to the Elias Sports Bureau, he is one of 299 players to have participated in at least 14 NBA seasons.Additionally, former NBA player Vittorio Gallinari's son, Gallinari is the second-highest-drafted Italian player ever after ex-No. 1 pick Andrea Bargnani and his 11,607 points are the highest of any Italian player in NBA history.Also read: When did Derrick Rose retire? Chicago Bulls announce retirement of the NBA legend's No. 1 jersey to honor their former MVP
Article Summary: Danilo gallinari, 37, has retired from the national basketball association. He played for the new york knicks, los angeles clippers, oklahoma city thunder, and atlanta hawks during his 16-year nba career. With puerto rican team vaqueros de bayamon, he won the domestic league championship for the first time.

Article Title: 2026 MLB draft: What the order looks like after new competitive balance slots
Article Text:
2026 MLB draft: What the order looks like after new competitive balance slots (Image Via Getty)

Competitive balance Round A and Round B final order shared by MLB

Round A picks:

Cleveland Guardians

Kansas City Royals

Arizona Diamondbacks

St. Louis Cardinals

Baltimore Orioles

Pittsburgh Pirates

Colorado Rockies



Round B picks:

Milwaukee Brewers

Seattle Mariners

Detroit Tigers

Cincinnati Reds

Miami Marlins

Tampa Bay Rays

Oakland A’s

Minnesota Twins





Teams like Dylan Cease ’s Padres and Kyle Schwarber ’s Phillies may add extra picks

The 2026 MLB Draft order started to take shape on Monday, December 2, 2025, when Major League Baseball shared the full list of Competitive Balance Round A and Round B picks. The top six spots will still depend on the MLB Draft Lottery that will be held on December 9, 2025, in Nashville, Tennessee, but teams now know where they stand in the special rounds. MLB uses a formula that mixes revenue, winning percentage, and market size to decide which clubs get these extra picks. Since 2017, these rounds have helped small-market teams stay competitive. This year, 15 teams will receive picks across the two rounds.MLB confirmed that Competitive Balance Round A will fall between first-round compensation picks and the second round, while Round B will come after the second round ends. The order is based on the 2025 regular-season standings, from best record to worst.These picks are the only Draft picks that MLB teams are allowed to trade. MLB official staff explained again on Monday that these selections cannot be taken away unless the pick has already been traded. One MLB spokesperson said, “These rounds help level the field. Clubs rely on them every year.”Some teams could get more selections once free agents who rejected qualifying offers join elsewhere.MLB rules dictate that after Round 4 the San Diego Padres will now be paid a selection since pitcher Dylan Cease signed a seven-year contract with the Toronto Blue Jays on Sunday, November 30, 2025.Other unsigned players who rejected qualifying offers including Kyle Schwarber, Ranger Suárez, Bo Bichette, Framber Valdez, Edwin Díaz, and Michael King could also cause extra picks depending on where they sign and how much they make.MLB also provided full lottery probabilities for the first six choices; the Chicago White Sox have the best chance at 27.73%.Because MLB rules preclude them this year, the Colorado Rockies, Washington Nationals, and Los Angeles Angels are not eligible.Also Read: Bo Bichette Contract Talks Hit Another Pause After Analysts Explain Major Risks Facing The Toronto Blue Jays
Article Summary: The 2026 mlb draft order started to take shape on monday, december 2, 2025. Major league baseball shared the full list of competitive balance round a and round b picks. The top six spots will still depend on the mlb draft lottery that will be held on december 9, 2025, in nashville, tennessee.

Article Title: Giannis Antetokounmpo leaving Milwaukee Bucks? NBA star shocks fans with sudden social media purge
Article Text:
Giannis Antetokounmpo stirred trade rumors (Image via NBA)

Giannis Antetokounmpo’s online activity has caused the Milwaukee Bucks to fear a possible trade

Milwaukee Bucks face rough patch despite Giannis Antetokounmpo’s return and top MVP form

On Tuesday morning, Milwaukee Bucks supporters discovered that Giannis Antetokounmpo 's social media profiles had changed significantly. Except for content from the 2021 championship, the Greek Freak has removed all posts related to the Bucks from his X and Instagram accounts.He only had photos from their NBA Finals and NBA Cup triumphs. Fans of the Bucks, who don't want to see Antetokounmpo traded to another team, naturally became alarmed over this. Giannis Antetokounmpo's most recent social media activity has also made Milwaukee fearful.Antetokounmpo appears to have also updated his bio on X to two words:"NBA athlete."His conduct has triggered significant trade talk in Milwaukee. The Greek Freak was clearly unhappy in Milwaukee based on his remarks about prioritizing earning a championship during the offseason and his interest in joining the New York Knicks.The Bucks' 2025-26 season was expected to affect Giannis Antetokounmpo's choice about his future. The front administration tried to address its roster difficulties by signing Miles Turner. Thanasis Antetokounmpo, Antetokounmpo's brother, was also signed to a one-year contract.But given how the Bucks have performed this season, they may be close to losing their star player. This season, they are ranked 11th in the Eastern Conference with a 9-13 record. Furthermore, Antetokounmpo has to accomplish even more on both ends without a second star.Despite Giannis' MVP stats, the Bucks have lost three of their last four games. The Washington Wizards were their most recent opponent. Antetokounmpo may have become frustrated after losing to the Wizards, the lowest team in the same conference.The Bucks have lost eight of their last nine games, and after their eighth consecutive setback Friday, Antetokounmpo pushed his squad to embrace a selfless approach in an effort to get things back on track.Antetokounmpo said to ESPN:"Nobody should have a personal agenda. Nobody should worry about what they want from themselves.. Worry only about winning mentality, winning mindset. The more we can win the games, the more everything takes care of itself."Meanwhile, as of yet, no trade request has been made.Giannis has repeatedly pledged his allegiance to Milwaukee. He wanted to keep with the Bucks and continue to win as part of the organization that first believed in him back when he was a teenager who was still tremendously raw as a basketball player.But in each of the past three seasons, the Bucks departed the playoffs in the first round. They're currently having their worst run in a long time. Milwaukee has lost eight of its last nine games.It doesn't even matter that Antetokounmpo has gotten back on the court from injury. The Bucks continue to have difficulties.Furthermore, Milwaukee hasn't made it past the first round of the playoffs since 2022 due to roster mismanagement and coaching dysfunction, which is an impressive accomplishment. Even Giannis himself hasn't said anything as of yet.Also read: Giannis Antetokounmpo celebrates EuroBasket bronze as Kostas Antetokounmpo faces uncertain NBA future
Article Summary: Giannis antetokounmpo has removed all posts related to the milwaukee bucks from his x and instagram accounts. The greek freak was clearly unhappy in milwaukee based on his remarks about prioritizing earning a championship during the offseason. The bucks have lost eight of their last nine games.

Article Title: Drake Maye’s wife Ann Michael’s new heartwarming post about the star player sparks chaos as the Patriots dominate the field
Article Text:
Drake Maye's wife Ann Michael's post has turned heads.(Image via Drake Maye/Instagram)

Drake Maye’s wife, Ann Michael, shares a heartwarming post with her husband, hours after the Patriots’ win



Ann Michael’s post about Drake Maye has sparked chaos among fans as the New England Patriots dominate on the field

Drake Maye, the New England Patriots’ star player, and his wife, Ann Michael, have inspired billions around the world with the love and commitment they have towards each other.While Drake Maye’s wife, Ann Michael, generally maintains a low profile, her recent post about her husband has turned heads and sparked chaos.As the New England Patriots defeated the New York Giants on Sunday as a part of their tenth consecutive win, all eyes were on Ann Michael as she cheered on her husband.The New England Patriots’ popular quarterback’s wife, Ann Michael, took to her Instagram stories to post a video of the team winning against the Giants on Monday night as the stadium erupted with excitement.The caption on the video reads as, “MNF! Go Pats! Go Drake!” as she cheered on the New England Patriots with the other WAGs of her husband’s teammates.A few hours ago, Drake Maye’s wife, Ann Michael, also posted a heartwarming picture alongside the star player at the Gillette Stadium as the couple looked excited and deeply in love with each other.The caption for the post reads as, “Kicking off December the only way we know how👏👏” and fans are here for it.A fan by the username @awhit0616 wrote, “What did you cook out MVP for dinner last night?”, while another fan by the username @joshkozub2 commented, “We couldn’t have won without your cookies”.A third fan by the username @dan_monahan_ joked, “Make sure he is fed well on his bye week please, just make sure you don’t bake anything that would upset his tummy”, while another fan by the username @laneyville21 wrote, “Beautiful couple 😍 love the “10” on your jeans”.For the unversed, over the last few months, Drake Maye’s wife, Ann Michael, has gained huge popularity on her social media accounts, especially on her TikTok account, where she posts several videos of her cooking.Even at the match against the New York Giants, Ann Michael reportedly baked Patriots’ themed cookies, which fans have now found heartwarming.Drake Maye and Ann Michael have been together for several years and tied the knot earlier this year, on 21st June 2025.Also Read: "He feels claustrophobic": Travis Kelce is reportedly struggling under pressure as he and Taylor Swift prepare for their lavish summer wedding
Article Summary: Drake maye’s wife, ann michael, posted a video of the new england patriots’ win against the new york giants on monday night. Ann michael also posted a heartwarming picture alongside the star player at the gillette stadium as the couple looked excited and deeply in love with each other.
